alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 5:17AM AKST until December 30 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches near Skagway ranging to around 12 inches near White Pass. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall will occur at higher elevations along the Klondike Highway from Friday afternoon through Friday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
